Name: Morgans Hotel Group Company
Description: DELISTED - Morgans Hotel Group Co. is a fully integrated lifestyle hospitality company that operates, owns, acquires, develops and redevelops boutique hotels, primarily in gateway cities and select resort markets in the United States, Europe and other international locations, and nightclubs, restaurants, bars and other food and beverage venues in many of the hotels it operate, as well as in hotels and casinos operated by MGM Resorts International (MGM) in Las Vegas. The Company conducts its operations through Morgans Group LLC. The Company also has a portfolio of brands, which include Sanderson, St Martins Lane, Royalton, Morgans, Clift, Ames and Shore Club. As of December 31, 2012, the Company is operating hotels in the United States, the United Kingdom, Mexico and Morocco.
